metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000223 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: soundtouch version up to and including 2.0.0 contains a Buffer Overflowvulnerability in SoundStretch/WavFile.cpp:WavInFile::readHeaderBlock() thatcan result in arbitrary code execution. This attack appear to beexploitable via victim must open maliocius file in soundstretch utility.

criterions.comment: soundtouch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
